name: Castle Defence - Sausage Saga
description:
The .zip file is the performance mode where I got rid of the trees and grass

the drive link (.7z) is the full non performance mode but you need a really good pc because I didnt optimise anything lol

Made with 2 developers in 24h total time spent on the project

@PlazeStudios 

@Mallard

Protect yourself and your sausage from a horde of knights who wish to eat it and take you down!

Featuring:

Endless knights

Endless ragdoll physics

A big gun

12h challenge video will be posted up on both of our channels
